```{r}

# Read in acrophily coefficient data for left and right-leaning users:
df_left <- read.csv('../data/user_coef_left.csv')
df_right <- read.csv('../data/user_coef_right.csv')

# Merge rows of dataframes:
df <- rbind(df_left, df_right)

# Save as csv:
write.csv(df, '../data/user_coef.csv', row.names=FALSE)
```
